properties.title: Images of the projection facade

children.value: From our offices in France, we remotely controlled a monumental projection on the wall of the

, in Lima, Peru.
During one evening, peruvians were invited to express their desires for the future on a digital wall of hope.

frontmatter.title: Novtec Lima
frontmatter.subtitle: Wall of hope
frontmatter.description: Videoprojected wall of hope on the facade of the Sala Luis Miro Quesada Garland in Lima, Peru. Organised by the French Alliance of Lima. Controlled remotely from France.
